text.more: This network is sorted by degree centrality. It is the full network from 11/2/16-11/8/16 of all public tweets that used the hashtag "#TRUMPRUSSIA". The edges are between uthe account that composed the tweet and any accounts they tagged/hashtags they used. Thee #TRUMPRUSSIA node was removed because it would give the graph one large component.
text.intro: Full network of twitter users who used the hasthag "#TRUMPRUSSIA"
text.title: Trump Russia Full Graph
